Data represents a huge effect on this game, more data means more right decisions. FPL Geek offers you more visualizing data to help you plan to dominate your mini-leagues.

Enhance the Fantasy Premier League website with FPL-Geek, for free!

⏭️ See each player's next 5 fixtures.
⏮️ See each player's points for the last five fixtures.
⏳ Selected by percentage.
🏋️ Statistics (xG, xA, Goals, Assists, xGc. Goals conceded, Saves, Clean sheets)
◾ Yellow cards suspension alert.
🌑 Dark mode.

😁 Also, you have all the flexibility to turn on or off any feature, so you can focus on what is important to you.

🏆 And much more are coming Soon...
